description: Main entry point and root widget setup for a Flutter application, including theme configuration, route registration, environment variable loading, and banner notification for missing API key.

classes.name: _RootWithBanner
classes.description: A wrapper widget that displays a global warning banner if the OpenAI API key is missing, and shows a child widget which is the main content of the app.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; initializes environment, runs the app with configurations.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a customized dark theme for the app with specific color scheme and button styles.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the MyApp widget; returns the MaterialApp with route definitions and theme.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the _RootWithBanner widget; displays warning banner if API key is missing.
